welcome_message_body: Welcome to Wokingham, a charming town known for its historic buildings, beautiful parks, and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that Wokingham has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Blackbushe Airport offers luxury services for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport offers a modern and spacious design, with a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Farnborough Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers, with VIP lounges and personalized services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, primarily used for domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Opened in 2014, this terminal serves mainly European and some long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal is used for long-haul flights, especially to North America and Asia.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Primarily used by SkyTeam airlines for long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow, used by British Airways and Iberia for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Premium options are also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lasham Airport is used for freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oxford (Kidlington) Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
